name: Tensteps
description:
You are very hungry, and in 10 steps you have to make your way to the burger to eat it. Why 10? Yes.

You can't take more or less than 10 steps. 

In version 1.0, there are 20 levels waiting for you, 11 in the web version. There may be bugs or errors in the game, I can't fix them because the license for the engine expires.
